prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged appearance and strong defenses to protect its allies.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, featuring sharp edges and a sturdy build.
Generate a creature with dark blue skin and vibrant orange accents, perfect for a battle-ready stance.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies resilience, with features resembling crystals and a fierce expression.
Design a Pokemon that can camouflage in rocky terrains, showcasing its ability to adapt.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sturdy and compact body, ideal for navigating through caves.
Make a Pokemon with a unique combination of colors that reflects its rocky habitat.
